messages.subject: what one dad said~ AWESOME!!!!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/13/02 1:06:37 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... WOWWWWWW~ that was awesome.........no more need be said !!! Denise [Non-text portions of this
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/13/02 1:06:37 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Last night I was at a meeting for our unschooling resource center, and this
> one dad said something that I just loved and agree with so much. . . that
> young folks (and people in general) are just learning machines and if we
> just
> get out of their way they will learn what they need. Sometimes it may take
> us
> a lifetime to really "get" that, but it is so true.
>
> Living in Abundance
> Mary
>
>
>
WOWWWWWW~ that was awesome.........no more need be said !!! Denise


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
